stories.title: Project setup
stories.description: Create Blazor WebAssembly project with .NET 8. Add Blazor.Extensions.Canvas package.

stories.title: Canvas component
stories.description: Create GameCanvas.razor with 800x600 HTML5 canvas using Blazor.Extensions.Canvas. Render solid background color.

stories.title: Game loop
stories.description: Implement requestAnimationFrame loop via JS interop. Target 60fps. Clear and redraw canvas each frame.

stories.title: Player entity
stories.description: Create Player.cs entity. Render green rectangle at bottom center. Move left/right with arrow keys or A/D. Stay within canvas bounds.

stories.title: Player shooting
stories.description: Spacebar fires bullet upward. Max 1 player bullet on screen at a time. Bullet disappears when leaving canvas.

stories.title: Invader grid
stories.description: Create Invader.cs entity. Render 5 rows x 11 columns (55 total) of invaders in formation at top of screen.

stories.title: Invader movement
stories.description: Invaders move horizontally together. When edge reached, reverse direction and drop down one row.

stories.title: Invader shooting
stories.description: Random bottom-row invader fires bullet downward periodically. Multiple enemy bullets allowed.

stories.title: Collision detection
stories.description: Implement CollisionDetection.cs. Player bullet hitting invader destroys both. Enemy bullet hitting player reduces lives.

stories.title: Shields
stories.description: Create 4 destructible shields between player and invaders. Shields degrade when hit by any bullet.

stories.title: Score and lives display
stories.description: Create ScoreDisplay.razor. Show current score, high score, and remaining lives. Update in real-time.

stories.title: Game states
stories.description: Implement GameState.cs with Start, Playing, GameOver states. Create StartScreen.razor and GameOverScreen.razor.

stories.title: Wave progression
stories.description: When all invaders destroyed, start new wave. New wave has faster invaders. Track wave number.

stories.title: Mystery UFO
stories.description: Random UFO crosses top of screen periodically. Worth 50-300 random points when destroyed.

stories.title: Sound and animations
stories.description: Add AudioService.cs for sound effects (shoot, explosion, invader move). Add simple animations for explosions.
